Billboard

  • Usage guidelines
  • Basic Billboard
  • Fluid Billboard
  • Dark background
  • Background images

Usage Guidelines

A Billboard is a hero panel used to feature an important message and call to action at the top of a page, typically the home page of a website. Billboards may use an image or graphic as the background to aid users in understanding the message and user desired action.

Do

  • Keep title and description brief
  • Use a clear call to action to navigate to another page, screen, or UI
  • Use when it is preferred that the presentation is visual in nature
  • Add a color overlay when using a background image, for improved readability

Don't

  • Include multiple billboards on a page
  • Link to direct downloads as the call to action
  • Use call to action to initiate a command or any process that is not navigation
  • Include ambiguous, distracting, or unrelated background images

Basic Billboard

Billboards typically includes a headline, one or two sentences of lead copy and a call to action.

Important Headline

Create interactive, decision logic based experiences for your customers! A Journey can house anything from a simple email to a complex year-long multi-stage campaign that reacts to the actions taken by the recipients along the way.

Action

Fluid Billboard

To eliminate the default side padding in favor of fluid container padding, add the .billboard-fluid modifier class with a .container-fluid inside.

No side padding

Ok, well there is side padding, but not on the billboard itself. The side padding here comes from the .container-fluid inside the billboard.

Got it

Dark background

Adding .bg-dark to the billboard or its parent inverts the text and link colors for improved readability.

Important Headline

Create interactive, decision logic based experiences for your customers! A Journey can house anything from a simple email to a complex year-long multi-stage campaign that reacts to the actions taken by the recipients along the way.

Action

Background images

When using an image background, it's a good idea to add a semi-opaque overlay to improve readability. This example shows how to add a light overlay for a light background image.

Light background image

This example uses a background image with a semi-transparent white linear gradient to add a light color mask to the background image and ensure readability.

Sweet

If the background image is dark, use a darker color overlay, combined with the .bg-dark class to invert the text color.

Dark background image

Adding the bg-dark class takes care of inverting the text, and then the same linear gradient trick is used to add a dark color overlay to ensure that the white text stands out.

Nice
